availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elisabeth Follis Whitaker in 1856. Father of James T. Whitaker and Ida Whitaker. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 45.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Providence District, p. 3.
Marriage Records. Kentucky Marriages. Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky.
